content:
We are happy to announce that there is an alpha release out now for R4. You can find the feed here (Myget):
https://www.myget.org/feed/fhir-net-api/package/nuget/Hl7.Fhir.R4

The source code you can find here (Github) in branch develop-r4: https://github.com/ewoutkramer/fhir-net-api/tree/develop-r4

Happy coding, the Firely team
